title: Demon Hunter
description:
---

Following the nuclear warfare, massacre extended towards the entire world. The order of mankind completely collapsed, and survival of the fittest became the ultimate principle.

Once natural desires were unchained, advancing forward no longer became an option. This world could only turn left or right.

The left leads to hell, the right, also leads to hell.

"The human race, for the sake of their dreams, they would end up creating demons"
